Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Design is knowing which ones to keep.
element represents an unordered list of items, typically rendered as a bulleted list.

element is for grouping a collection of items that do not have a numerical ordering, and their order in the list is meaningless. Typically, unordered-list items are displayed with a bullet, which can be of several forms, like a dot, a circle or a squared.
There is no limitation to the depth and alternation of nested lists defined with the
elements both represent a list of items. They differ in that, with the
element represents an ordered list of items, typically rendered as a numbered list.
Typically, ordered-list items are displayed with a preceding numbering, which can be of any form, like numerals, letters or Romans numerals or even simple bullets.
There is no limitation to the depth and alternation of nested lists defined with the
